misuse: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values.
vulnerable_code:
SecureRandom random = new SecureRandom();
String defaultKey = String.valueOf(random.ints());
description: The use of random.ints() to generate a default key may not provide sufficient randomness for cryptographic purposes.
recommendation: Use a more secure method to generate a random key, such as SecureRandom.nextBytes() or a cryptographic key generator.
